functional/basic.html.name: Basics
functional/basic.html.description: The most basic functionality: one taskbar and one window with no additional options.

functional/containments.html.name: Containments
functional/containments.html.description: Difference between window "containment" option set to "viewport" and window "containment" options set to "visible".

technical/icons.html.name: Icons
technical/icons.html.description: How to change icons on both taskbar and window.

technical/iconsFamfamfam.html.name: famfamfam iconset
technical/iconsFamfamfam.html.description: Famous famfamfam iconset used for supplying icons.

functional/propagateWindowBlur.html.name: Taskbar "propagateWindowBlur" option
functional/propagateWindowBlur.html.description: Difference between taskbar "propagateWindowBlur" option set to false and taskbar "propagateWindowBlur" options set to true.

technical/setup.html.name: $.simone.taskbarSetup and $.simone.windowSetup methods
technical/setup.html.description: Show how $.simone.taskbarSetup and $.simone.windowSetup can be used to change the default widgets setup, and how it can be optionally applied to existing widget instance.

functional/taskbarMenuAutoOpenOnBrowse.h.name: Taskbar "menuAutoOpenOnBrowse" option
functional/taskbarMenuAutoOpenOnBrowse.h.description: Difference between window "menuAutoOpenOnBrowse" option set to false and window "menuAutoOpenOnBrowse" options set to true.

functional/taskbarAutoHide.html.name: Taskbar autohide
functional/taskbarAutoHide.html.description: Two taskbars with autohide on, one with default durations, and one with custom durations.

functional/taskbarDraggable.html.name: Draggable taskbars
functional/taskbarDraggable.html.description: Two draggable taskbars with default options.

functional/taskbarDraggableBetweenEdges..name: Taskbar draggable between edges
functional/taskbarDraggableBetweenEdges..description: Shows what it means that taskbar is draggable between edges.

technical/taskbarButtons.html.name: Taskbar buttons
technical/taskbarButtons.html.description: How custom taskbar buttons can be inserted and manipulated.

technical/taskbarDraggableEvents.html.name: Taskbar's draggable events
technical/taskbarDraggableEvents.html.description: How taskbar's draggable can be programmed using draggable events and what events are related to draggable.

technical/taskbarLanguageChange.html.name: Taskbar "languageChange" event
technical/taskbarLanguageChange.html.description: Show how to propagate (or not propagate) "languageChange" event to other taskbars.

functional/taskbarResizable.html.name: Resizable taskbars
functional/taskbarResizable.html.description: Resizable posibilities of horizontal and vertical taskbar.

functional/taskbarResolveCollisions.html.name: Taskbar collisions resolving
functional/taskbarResolveCollisions.html.description: Three draggable taskbars, showing how collisions resolving works.

technical/taskbarSmoothVerticalResizable.name: Smooth resizable on vertical taskbar
technical/taskbarSmoothVerticalResizable.description: How to make vertical resizable smooth.

technical/taskbarSortableEvents.html.name: Taskbar sortable events
technical/taskbarSortableEvents.html.description: Events related to taskbar sortable window buttons.

technical/taskbarSubordinatesEvents.html.name: Taskbar subordinates events
technical/taskbarSubordinatesEvents.html.description: Events related to taskbar subordinate elements.

functional/taskbarSystemButtons.html.name: Taskbar system buttons
functional/taskbarSystemButtons.html.description: Shows all system buttons in one taskbar.

technical/taskbarStartButtons.html.name: Taskbar start buttons
technical/taskbarStartButtons.html.description: How to build and manipulate start menus.

technical/taskbarViewportMargins.html.name: Taskbar "viewportMargins" option
technical/taskbarViewportMargins.html.description: How to use different settings of "viewportMargins" to set windowsContainment size.

technical/windowButtons.html.name: Window buttons
technical/windowButtons.html.description: Shows how buttons can be prepended to window using native functionality.

functional/windowConfirmClose.html.name: Confirm close functionality
functional/windowConfirmClose.html.description: Window confirm close functionality with some customization options.

functional/windowDurations.html.name: Window durations
functional/windowDurations.html.description: Shows how different durations are applied to window.

functional/windowEmbeddedContent.html.name: Window "embeddedContent" option
functional/windowEmbeddedContent.html.description: Shows how windows containing embedded content, like iframe, Flash game, or QuickTime video, can be dealt with.

technical/windowFlow.html.name: Window flow
technical/windowFlow.html.description: Demonstrates maximizing, minimizing, restoring, and showing.

functional/windowInteractions.html.name: Window interactions
functional/windowInteractions.html.description: Demonstrates window interactions: draggable and resizable.

technical/windowUnclosable.html.name: Unclosable window
technical/windowUnclosable.html.description: Shows what options should be applied to window to make it unclosable.
